translations.original_text:
महिला ने लिया था पहलगाम आतंकी का फोटो 

◆ आंतकी महिला से ले रहा था जानकारी 

#PahalgamTerroristAttack | #PahalgamAttack | Pahalgam Attack https://t.co/mmC8FJfpRq
translations.translated_text:
Woman took photo of Pahalgam terrorist 

◆ was taking information from the terrorist woman 

#Pahalgamteroristattack | #Pahalgamattack | Pahalgam Attack https://t.co/mmc8fjfprq

translations.original_text:
Pahalgam Attack: पहलगाम हमले में शहीद हुए मधुसूदन राव... 

श्रद्धांजलि देते वक्त बेटे ने किया पिता को सैल्यूट.. पार्थिव शरीर को कई बार चूमा

#PahalgamTerroristAttack #pahalgamattack #Pahalgam #पहलगाम_आतंकी_हमला #TamilNadu https://t.co/JfaFVC0vXN
translations.translated_text:
Pahalgam Attack: Madhusudan Rao, martyred in Pahalgam attack ... 

While paying tribute, son saluted father .. Kissed the body several times

#Pahalgamteroristattack #Pahalgamattack #Pahalgam
